sentences.en: After tonight's show, we'll have a share - out of the takings.
sentences.cn: 今晚演出后, 我们要分配所得收入.

sentences.en: After we've closed , we count the day's takings.
sentences.cn: 打烊之后我们结算一天的营业额.

sentences.en: Box office takings are up by 40 % on last year.
I really loved making different takings during the race.
In its 1986 Term, the Supreme Court decided three important takings cases.
sentences.cn: 在1986年的条款中, 最高法院裁定了3个重要的征用案例.

sentences.en: She was losing about ￡100 a week in takings.
sentences.cn: 她的进款每周下降约100英镑.

sentences.en: Store managers are predicting record takings this Christmas.
sentences.cn: 商店经理预计今年圣诞节期间的销售额将创新高.

sentences.en: Takings at the pier have dropped off this season.
sentences.cn: 这个季节,码头上的收入下降了.

sentences.en: The box office takings are up on last week.
sentences.cn: 票房收入较上星期有所增长。

sentences.en: The cashier has done a bunk with the day's takings.
sentences.cn: 出纳员携带该日营业收入逃走了.

sentences.en: The dealers can rake in another ten or fifteen percent on the takings.
sentences.cn: 商人可赚得另外10%或15%的收入.

sentences.en: The pub said that their takings were fifteen to twenty thousand pounds a week.
sentences.cn: 这家酒馆说，它一周的营业额在1.5万到2万英镑之间。

sentences.en: The takings at the football stadium has fallen off.
sentences.cn: 足球运动场的收入减少了.

sentences.en: The takings haven't been totalled yet.
Their takings were fifteen to twenty thousand dollars a week.
sentences.cn: 他们的营业收入是每周1.5万至2万美元之间。

sentences.en: Why would a green tax increase the airlines'takings?
sentences.cn: 为什么绿色税会增加航空公司的收益?

trans.tran_en: You can use takings to refer to the amount of money that a business such as a shop or a movie theatre gets from selling its goods or tickets during a particular period
